headerDisplay: [RPi](https://www.raspberrypi.org) GPIO based LED Strip plugin for [Homebridge](https://github.com/nfarina/homebridge).

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

username.title: Username
username.description: Username that you use to log into the Rubetek mobile app (your phone number)

password.title: Password
password.description: Password that you use to log into the Rubetek mobile app

deviceID.title: Device ID
deviceID.description: Device ID. Looks like an UUID. You can find out how to retrieve one in the README

houseID.title: House ID
houseID.description: House ID. Looks like a number. You can find out how to retrieve one in the README
